FlashbackHeroUI.PrivacyDesc: SeaMeet chup anh {{duration}}s trong qua khu cua {{type}} trong buffer vong tren RAM may tinh cua ban.
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackOff: Hoi tuong hien tai dang tat. Bat dau ghi binh thuong bat cu luc nao, hoac chon che do hoi tuong (am thanh hoac man hinh) ben tren de luu khoanh khac anh hung.
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackInitAudio: Ban da san sang de bao ve am thanh cua minh chua?
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackInitScreen: San sang de bao ve man hinh cua ban?
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackInitDescription: Nhan 'San sang?' de yeu cau SeaMeet bat dau 'nho' qua khu.
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackChargingDescription: Chuan bi cua so {{seconds}} giay... {{percent}}% hoan thanh.
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackReady: Khong bao gio bo lo mot khoanh khac nao.
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackReadyDescription: Hoi tuong da san sang. {{seconds}} giay cua {{type}} se duoc bao gom khi ban ghi.
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackPrivacy: Quyen rieng tu cua ban duoc bao ve. Duoc luu tru cuc bo trong RAM.
FlashbackHeroUI.KeepWindowVisible: Giu cua so SeaMeet hien thi khi chup anh man hinh
FlashbackHeroUI.FlashbackMismatch: Che do hoi tuong khong phu hop. Ghi am thanh nhung hoi tuong video dang hoat dong. Vui long tat hoi tuong video.
